did.unittitle: Office of the Chancellor. Administrative files.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Office of the Chancellor

did.abstract: Record Series 359 contains the administrative files generated within the Office of the Chancellor at the University of California, Los Angeles between 1936-1959.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright. All requests for permission to publish or quote must be submitted in writing to the UCLA University Archivist.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Office of the Chancellor. Administrative files (University Archives Record Series 359). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The following individuals have served as Chancellor (or equivalent) at the University of California, Los Angeles:

Director and Provost Ernest Carroll Moore - 1919-1936
Provost Earle Hedrick - 1937-1942
Provost Clarence Dykstra - 1945-1950
Chancellor Raymond Allen - 1952-1959
Chancellor Vern Knudsen - 1959-1960
Chancellor Franklin Murphy - 1960-1968
Chancellor Charles Young - 1968-1997
Chancellor Albert Carnesale - 1997-2006
Acting Chancellor Norman Abrams - 2006-2007
Chancellor Gene Block - 2007-Present

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 359 contains the administrative files generated within the Office of the Chancellor at the University of California, Los Angeles between 1936-1959. Files regard the operation of the University.
Please see additional collection guide for the container list of Record Series 359.
This is an inactive record series; no additional University records are expected to be added.
